channel.title: Getting into RGB SCART
channel.description: Hi all! I've recently acquired an NTSC PS1 and slim PS2 and barring the PS2 (got component cables), I was wondering how I would hook up the PS1 using SCART to get RGB output. Hoping to get any thoughts and ideas on this. Thanks!
